扸字的基本解释

扸
xī
古通“析”。

扸
zhé
折，散。

扸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《玉篇》星歷切］
(1)析；分。
(2)见“扸扸”。
[②]［zhé］
同“折1”。
折断。

扸字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　扸； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页419第10
【玉篇】星歷切，俗析字。【正字通】同析。　又音席。【揚子·太?經】常變錯，故百事扸。【註】謂百事分扸。　又與折同。【元包經】輿之扸。傳曰：輿之扸，車之脫也。【註】輿車扸散。◎按唐韻先擊切，集韻先的切，?从木作㭊，與析同，無扸。

扸字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
扸字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［xī］
["Jade Pian" Star Calendar Cut]
(1) Analyze; divide.
(2) See "Fu Fu".
[②]［zhé］

Break off.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji] [Hand Character Department] 　扸; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 419 No. 10
【Jade articles】Astrological calendar cut, vulgar word analysis. [Zhengzitong] Same analysis.　Yinshi. 【Yangtze·Tai? Scripture】It is often wrong, so Pepsi. [Note] It is called Pepsi.　The same with Zhe again. 【Yuanbaojing】Yuzhijiao. Chuan said: Yu Zhifei, the car is also free. [Note] The car is scattered. ◎According to Tang Yun, first strike and cut, set rhyme first, cut from wood, same as analysis, without reference.
